original_text: That will be like new clothes that we put on. When we go to live there, we will not be without clothes and ashamed.
korean_text: 이렇게 입음은 우리가 벗은 자들로 발견되지 않으려 함이라

sentences.original_text: That will be like new clothes
When we go to live there
we will not be without clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 옷 없이 있지 않을 것입니다
